name: Loopocalypse
description:
Controls

- Drag & drop by mouse

- M to mute

Instructions

The goal of the game is to help citizens get rid of their loops.

 You have to put different kinds of characters in proper rooms - you can see which workshop is correct by looking at the room's border while hovering a character over it (white border means it's a right room). Also, you obviously shouldn't put people in an occupied room. By the way - watch out for Homer! He's a party pooper and spoils your combo!

The combo rewards you for making no mistakes in matching characters to rooms. The bigger the combo, the more cash you get!

Description

The game was created for 47th Ludum Dare Jam in 72 hours by a team of four nerds.

 https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/loopocalypse

The topic of the game jam was Stuck in a loop. We took this topic very seriously and stuck many characters in different kinds of loops.

 We hope you enjoy this short game. Have fun!
